fonseka mahatha 2006 aprel 25 da el. ti. ti. ee. maragena marena bombakariyakage praharayata lakwa barapathala thuwala labuweya. 2009 mayi 18 da sarath fonseka mahathage hamuda nayakathwaya yatathe el. ti. ti. ee. ya parajaya wi yuda jayagrahanaya labu athara 2009 juli 15 da aarakshaka mandalika pradhani thanathurata ee mahathawa usas karana ladi. 2009 nowambar 16 da sarath fonseka mahatha hamuda sewayen wishrama labu athara 2010 janawari 27 da janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha samanga tharaga karamin janadhipathiwaranayata idiripath wuyeya.
